structure.unit: TRAFFIC REGULATIONS -- VEHICLE EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE

law.catch_line: Roadblocks for sole purpose of checking for seat belt violations prohibited.
law.text: All law enforcement agencies in this state shall be prohibited from erecting roadblocks for the sole purpose of checking for violations of KRS 189.125.
law.history: Created 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 180, sec. 12, effective July 12, 2006.
